statements: SELECT * FROM lead_scoring;
SELECT lead_id, customer_name, email FROM lead_scoring;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, lead_score FROM lead_scoring ORDER BY lead_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM lead_scoring WHERE lead_score > 50;
SELECT lead_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM lead_scoring WHERE lead_score < 30;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM lead_scoring WHERE lead_score > 50 ORDER BY lead_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM lead_scoring WHERE lead_score BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM lead_scoring WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT lead_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM lead_scoring WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY lead_id DESC;
SELECT lead_id, customer_name, email, phone_number, lead_score FROM lead_scoring WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' AND email <> 'john@example.com' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE id = 123;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM leads WHERE lead_source = 'Website';
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE lead_score > 50 ORDER BY lead_score DESC;
SELECT id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE lead_id = 456 AND interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM leads WHERE lead_source LIKE '%Ad%';
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM leads WHERE lead_score > 50;
SELECT id, name, email, interaction_type FROM leads INNER JOIN interactions ON leads.id = interactions.lead_id;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE lead_source='Website' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT lead_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number, interaction_notes FROM leads LEFT JOIN interactions ON leads.id = interactions.lead_id WHERE lead_score IS NULL;
SELECT account_name, revenue FROM Account
SELECT lead_score, lead_source FROM Lead
SELECT prospect_id, contact_name, email, phone_number FROM Prospect
SELECT industry, account_name, revenue FROM Account
SELECT lead_id, account_id, lead_score, lead_source, lead_status FROM Lead
SELECT * FROM Account WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT account_name, industry, revenue FROM Account ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, industry, revenue FROM Account WHERE revenue > 100000 ORDER BY industry ASC;

SELECT Lead.lead_id, Lead.lead_score, Account.account_name, Account.revenue FROM Lead INNER JOIN Account ON Lead.account_id = Account.account_id WHERE Lead.lead_score > 80 ORDER BY Lead.lead_score DESC;

SELECT Prospect.prospect_id, Prospect.contact_name, Lead.lead_source, Account.industry FROM Prospect INNER JOIN Lead ON Prospect.lead_id = Lead.lead_id INNER JOIN Account ON Lead.account_id = Account.account_id WHERE Lead.lead_source = 'Website' ORDER BY Prospect.contact_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM leads WHERE lead_score > 50;
SELECT prospect_name, deal_amount FROM prospects INNER JOIN deals ON prospects.prospect_id = deals.prospect_id;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_notes FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;

SELECT lead_name, lead_email, prospect_name, deal_amount FROM leads JOIN prospects ON leads.lead_id = prospects.prospect_id JOIN deals ON prospects.prospect_id = deals.prospect_id WHERE deals.deal_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE lead_score > 50 ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name FROM leads WHERE lead_id = 10;
SELECT prospect_name, deal_amount FROM prospects INNER JOIN deals ON prospects.prospect_id = deals.prospect_id WHERE deal_status = 'Closed Won';
SELECT interactions.interaction_type, leads.lead_name FROM interactions LEFT JOIN leads ON interactions.lead_id = leads.lead_id;
SELECT * FROM prospects WHERE prospect_score BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY prospect_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM leads WHERE lead_score > 50 ORDER BY lead_name ASC;

SELECT lead_name, demographics.age, purchases.product_name FROM leads JOIN demographics ON leads.lead_id = demographics.lead_id JOIN purchases ON leads.lead_id = purchases.lead_id WHERE demographics.age >= 30 ORDER BY purchases.purchase_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY interaction_type HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT lead_name, scores.lead_score FROM leads JOIN scores ON leads.lead_id = scores.lead_id WHERE scores.score_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_score FROM leads WHERE lead_score > 80 ORDER BY lead_score DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, interaction_type FROM leads l JOIN interactions i ON l.lead_id = i.lead_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT lead_id, age, location FROM demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT lead_id, product_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases p JOIN scores s ON p.lead_id = s.lead_id WHERE s.lead_score < 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;

SELECT lead_name, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp, purchase_amount FROM leads l JOIN interactions i ON l.lead_id = i.lead_id JOIN purchases p ON l.lead_id = p.lead_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Call' AND purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
